companyDescription: With OneFootball, we're forging a new path in the Blockchain/NFT space. We've established a unique strategy to build an amazing product in partnership with the most prolific organizations in the NFT field. We are interested in making a long-term contribution and pushing the sports/NFT ecosystem to the next level.
title: Frontend Engineer NFT
jobDescription: Developed an innovatie NFT marketplace application frontend (MVP cycles)
Built reusable components based on Figma designs
Developed unit, integration and functional tests e.g. Jest, Playwright
Optimized for maximum speed and scalability e.g. Lighthouse, validator.w3
Collaborated with internal and external stakeholders (product managers, UX/UI agencies and business stakeholders)

companyDescription: This is my final project form Le Wagon. What if there was a tinder for surfers and waves? SurfEasy is a mobile friendly app searching the best waves depending on a surfers location, level and live weather data. It was developed as a team of 4 in 2 weeks.
title: FullStack Engineer
jobDescription: Pitched and developed the idea from scratch to production
Created user stories based on defined customer profiles
Designed user paths and pages in figma with UX/UI designers
Collaborated with 4 developers to implement both backend and frontend
Developed a solution matching the user profile to live weather conditions (API)
Shipped the prototype to production

companyDescription: This is my first project form Le Wagon. Are you stuck with your code? Rent a techy gets you technical support immediately from skilled and trustworthy people. This app is connecting developers and experts with people in need of support. Users can filters all developers that are available based on their skills, then book a session and leave a review of the support. It was developed as a team of 4 in 1 week.
title: FullStack Engineer
jobDescription: Based the prototype on a Airbnb MVP model
Designed user paths and pages in figma
Collaborated with 4 developers to implement both backend and frontend
Developed a booking system for users (host/guest model)
Shipped the prototype to production

companyDescription: Discover big ideas from small brands. The Amazon Launchpad mission is to support entrepreneurs by providing resources, expertise and global support to help showcase and deliver innovative products like yours to millions of Amazon customers.

companyDescription: OneFootball is a Germany-based football media company. The OneFootball app features live-scores, statistics and news from 200 leagues in 12 different languages covered by a newsroom located in Berlin.
